summary: This document contains Palm Beach Sheriff's Office line-up information and photo lineup forms from August 2006, including booking details for Jeffrey Epstein and several other individuals. It appears to be part of the 2005-2006 investigation into Epstein, showing police procedures for witness identification.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Appears in Palm Beach Sheriff's Office line-up information with booking details including birth date 01/20/1953, age 53, and booking ID 20060723017.

events.title: Police Line-up Procedures
events.description: Palm Beach Sheriff's Office conducted multiple line-up sessions for witness identification as part of investigation case 05-368.

events.title: Photo Line-up by Palm Beach Police
events.description: Palm Beach Police Department conducted photo line-up procedures for witness identification in the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Additional Photo Line-up
events.description: Sheriff's office conducted additional photo line-up procedures showing multiple female individuals with blond/strawberry hair.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's booking information shows he was 53 years old in 2006, 6 ft. 0 in. tall, 180 lbs., with gray hair and hazel eyes.
The document references investigation case number 05-368, which appears to be the original Palm Beach Police Department case against Epstein.
Multiple line-up sessions were conducted on August 9, 2006, with times ranging from 2:13 PM to 2:26 PM.
Photo line-ups included both male and female individuals, with specific attention to female individuals with blond/strawberry hair in later sessions.
The document includes standard witness instructions for line-ups emphasizing that witnesses are not obliged to identify anyone and should not discuss the case with others.
